text:
It would be handy to have the replacement string in (Request)Header edit be a formatted string or something similar to the rewritten URI in a rewrite rule.

An Example: add a port number from environment variable to Host Header

SetEnv envVariable {some port number from somewhere--a rewritemap lookup for instance}

RequestHeader edit Host ^([^:]*) $1:%{envVariable}e


How I do it now:

SetEnv envVariable {some port number from somewhere}
Rewritecond %{HTTP:Host} ^([^:]*)
Rewriterule ^ - [env=newHost:%1:%{env:envVariable}]
RequestHeader set Host %{newHost}e
